title: Ticket #776: Show stdout/stderr size on build results page
description:
On the Run-condor-taskdetails.php page of our nightly builds report, it would be nice to have the stderr and stdout sizes listed next to the filenames. In particular, knowing that a file is empty is useful.

Representative link: http://nmi-s006.cs.wisc.edu/results/Run-condor-taskdetails.php?platform=nmi:x86_macos_10.4&task=static&runid=184498
creator: adesmet
